com.samsung.android.sdk

Interface SsdkInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SA, SAft, Sapa, Scup, Sgesture, Shealth, Sif, Slook, Smc, Smotion, SMultiWindow, Spass, Spen, Srs, SV

    public interface SsdkInterface
    This interface defines initializing operation of Samsung Mobile SDK. All SDKs should implement initializing class using SsdkInterface. Initializing class should be located at the top of the SDK packages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getVersionCode()
      returns VersionCode of SDK.
      String getVersionName()
      returns VersionName of SDK.
      void initialize(Context context)
      All SDKs should implement initialize(Context context) method.
      boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
      returns the result that SDK supports specific feature or not.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        All SDKs should implement initialize(Context context) method. If failed to initialize, SDK should not operate.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException

      • isFeatureEnabled

        boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
        returns the result that SDK supports specific feature or not.

      • getVersionCode

        int getVersionCode()
        returns VersionCode of SDK.

      • getVersionName

        String getVersionName()
        returns VersionName of SDK.
